column1: Relatives and friends may visit the LOMBARDO FUNERAL HOME
column3: 885 Niagara Falls Blvd. near Eggert/Sheridan Dr. on Monday from 2-8 PM where prayers will be said on Tuesday morning at 9 o'clock and a Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at St. Gregory the Great Church at 10:30 o'clock. Interment Mt. Olivet Cemetery. Mr. Mitri served in the US Army during WW II.
